name: Ghirardelli Square Hotel
proximityToAttractions: Located in the heart of Ghirardelli Square, steps away from Fisherman's Wharf and the Golden Gate Bridge.
wifi: Free high-speed WiFi available in all areas of the hotel.
breakfast: Complimentary continental breakfast served every morning.
poolAndSpa: Outdoor heated pool and spa available for all guests.
climateControl: Individual climate control in every room.
recentReview: The hotel exceeded my expectations. The staff was friendly, the rooms were clean, and the location was perfect. Would definitely stay here again!
cancellation: Flexible cancellation policy with no fees if cancelled 24 hours prior to arrival.
restaurant: On-site restaurant offering a variety of gourmet dishes.
familyFriendly: Family-friendly amenities such as cribs and babysitting services upon request.
shuttleService: Complimentary shuttle service to popular attractions in San Francisco.
parking: Valet parking available for an additional fee.
safetyAndSecurity: 24/7 security surveillance throughout the hotel premises.
specialOffers: Exclusive discounts and special offers for hotel guests.
ambianceAndDecor: Elegant and modern decor with a touch of historical charm.
environmentalInitiatives: Dedicated to sustainable practices including energy conservation and recycling.
businessAmenities: Business center, meeting rooms, and high-speed internet access for business travelers.
viewAndSurroundings: Panoramic views of the city skyline and nearby attractions.
noiseLevel: Soundproofed rooms for a peaceful and quiet stay.
